data.name: Beach Picnic
data.description: Relax on lovely Manly Beach, one of Australia’s most famous beaches where the first world surfing contest was held in 1964. You’ll find plenty of wonderful things to do and see, from picnics on the promenade to fun and informative tours, including surfing, snorkelling, diving, cycling and walking.

data.name: Freshie Community Garden
data.description: Freshie Community Garden seeks to create an attractive, welcome, shared and safe place to grow fruit trees, vegetables and flowers using sustainable practices, and to promote social harmony and inclusion through building community capacity.

data.name: Sunset Cinema
data.description: The warmer weather has arrived and those wonderful balmy nights are perfect for enjoying outdoor cinema. Australia’s favourite open-air cinema, Moonlight Cinema, returns for another season offering a full program of silver screen blockbusters.

data.name: Super Kids Sports
data.description: Super Kids Sports is a MULTI-SPORTS program bringing FUN and EXCITEMENT to your little super hero. The program is designed to encourage a love of sport whilst helping children learn and develop a range of sport, movement and life skills that help them FLY through life.

data.name: Gatehouse Tea Rooms
data.description: A 2017 Winner of Parramatta Chamber of Commerce Patron’s Choice Award for recognition for outstanding achievement, Macquarie St Gatehouse High Tea Rooms is the perfect place to get away from the hustle and bustle of busy city life and relax.

data.name: North Rocks Market
data.description: Winner of 7 major awards including Best New Musical at the Olivier Awards, this is a high energy romantic comedy about knowing who you are and showing what you've got!

data.name: Legally Blonde - The Musical
data.description: The warmer weather has arrived and those wonderful balmy nights are perfect for enjoying outdoor cinema. Australia’s favourite open-air cinema, Moonlight Cinema, returns for another season offering a full program of silver screen blockbusters.

data.name: The Finishing Touches Exhibition
data.location: Hunter Street Gallery of Fine Arts, Paramatta
data.description: We are the only permanent Fine Arts Gallery in Parramatta, we change our display  every 7 to 8 weeks and sell our members work. We have many well-known experienced artists as well as up and coming artists.  Over the last 2 years we have gained a reputation of selling fine art to locals and visitors to Parramatta.

data.name: Blend Your Own Gin Class
data.description: Join us for an evening as we walk you through the history of gin as well as how we make our own here at Archie Rose. You will then get the chance to blend a selection of Archie Rose’s pure botanical distillates to create your own signature blends. Each guest will leave with two 200ml flasks of their own, truly unique, gins.

data.name: Sartorial - Vivid Ideas
data.description: This is the newest frontier in fashion, where fibre, fabric and silhouette are merged with microcomputers, sensors and artificial intelligence, to amplify the environment-sensing abilities of the human body. The goal is sartorial fashion elegance that informs the wearers sensory systems using scientific data.

data.name: Mary's
data.description: Marys‘s opened in a former STD clinic on a small back street in Newtown in 2013, quickly gaining a reputation as one of Sydney’s hottest joints.  With the red light hanging out front, the lines formed, and have barely moved since. Short menu, loud music and plenty of booze is the recipe from which the Marys juggernaut continues to grow.

data.name: Moonlight Cinema
data.description: The warmer weather has arrived and those wonderful balmy nights are perfect for enjoying outdoor cinema. Australia’s favourite open-air cinema, Moonlight Cinema, returns for another season offering a full program of silver screen blockbusters.

data.name: Waverley cliff walk
data.description: The Waverley Cliff Walk is a popular and unique attraction in our community for its natural beauty and panoramic views out to the ocean.

data.name: City2Surf
data.description: The City2Surf is a popular road running event held annually in Sydney covering a 14-kilometre course. The event is a 'fun run' as well as a race, attracting both competitive runners and community participants who can choose to run or to walk.

data.name: Raw Bar
data.description: Raw Bar: location, location, location. The Japanese eatery is high enough on the hill to glimpse the glistening blue of Bondi Beach. The view and the ultra-fresh sashimi have been pleasing crowds of locals and tourists since 1993.

data.name: Lox, Stock and Barrel
data.description: This deli and café in Bondi is hugely popular with locals, and we can see why. The guys at Lox, Stock and Barrel focus on seasonal and locally sourced ingredients, with dishes inspired by their Jewish ancestors. And before you ask, yes, there are bagels—good ones too! Get yours with scrambled or poached eggs and a mandatory side of smoked lox or NY pastrami (we say it’s mandatory because you’re missing out if you don’t order at least one side!).
